description.value:
Special: SM Wep, Flame, Spray

Note: Space Marines Only. Master-Crafted Relic Astartes Heavy Flamer of the Death Spectres Chapter. Imposes -10 to Agility Tests to avoid damage or catching fire. Anything hiding within 30m of something set on fire by this weapon suffers -30 to Concealment Tests. As with all Astartes Flamers, those on fire take +4 damage from being on fire.
